item.title: Smartphone Charger and Backup Battery
item.description: We all know the struggle of low battery life. It always seems to happen at the worst possible time, leaving us stranded. If you’re tired of being tethered to a wall outlet, the ZAGGsparq 2.0 might be the solution. This handy device is both a charger and a backup battery. You can charge your USB devices, which seems like almost everything these days, and it provides up to four times the charge of your device’s battery.
